thread.title: Colorado Court Rules You Can Be Fired For Medical Marijuana (Even Though It’s Legal)
thread.title_full: Colorado Court Rules You Can Be Fired For Medical Marijuana (Even Though It’s Legal)

author: Alan Colmes
title: Colorado Court Rules You Can Be Fired For Medical Marijuana (Even Though It’s Legal)
text:
Colmes Quarters Jun 16, 2015 
Colorado’s Supreme Court upheld a ruling Monday that allows for a company to fire an employee for failing a drug test, even if the employee is legally licensed to use marijuana for medical reasons. Colorado is one of 23 states that has legalized medical marijuana. The state has also allowed recreational marijuana use. Brandon Coats was… Now read this:
